quotes.quote: Every child begins the world again.
A baby is a blank cheque made payable to the human race.
Babies are always more trouble than you thought â€” and more wonderful.
A baby is an inestimable blessing and a bother.
Sometimes the smallest things take the most room in your heart.
Where did you come from, baby dear? Out of the everywhere and into here.
Girl or boy, you'll bring much joy.
Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart.
Someone special, someone dear, someone new to love is here.
Having a baby is like falling in love again, both with your husband and your child.
A new baby is like the beginning of all things wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
A person's a person, no matter how small.
A babe in the house is a well-spring of pleasure, a messenger of peace and love, a resting place for innocence on earth, a link between angels and men.
Making the decision to have a child is momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
Babies make your heart bigger!
A baby is God's opinion that the world should go on.
Every child born into the world is a new thought of God, an ever-fresh and radiant possibility.
Ten little fingers, ten perfect toes fill our hearts with love that overflows.
Babies are bits of stardust, blown from the hand of God.
A baby is born with a need to be loved -- and never outgrows it.
I don't know why they say "you have a baby." The baby has you.
It is no small thing that they, who are so fresh from God, love us.
A baby will make love stronger, days shorter, nights longer, bankroll smaller, home happier, clothes shabbier, the past forgotten, and the future worth living for.
Babies: Messier, louder, sweeter, softer, and more loveable than you could ever imagine.
Aside from new babies, new mothers must be the most beautiful creatures on earth.
A new baby is like the beginning of all things â€“ wonder, hope, a dream of possibilities.
Babies are such a nice way to start people.
From there to here from here to there, baby things are everywhere!
A baby is cuddles and tickles on toes, The sweet scent of powder, a kiss on the nose!
A baby is sunshine and moonbeams and more brightening your world has never seen before.
